name: Basket Busters - AR Basketball
description:
Ever dreamed of experiencing a unique basketball challenge with your friends? Explore the world of Augmented Reality with the new Multiplayer AR game, Basket Busters!

Basket Busters is an Augmented Reality game that lets you play basketball in your real world. You can challenge yourself at different levels with exiting balls and hoops or even share this experience with your friends in the multiplayer mode. In this mode, you will play with up to 4 players in the same physical world and shoot the same hoop together in real-time. You will be able to play with your own favorite ball with its unique abilities and combo powers. So hurry up! Invite your friends to this incredible multiplayer experience and show them the best basketball player of all times!

You will also get the chance of playing basketball at your home, office, school or garden, in brief everywhere, without any need to find a hoop or ball. And you can also select different hoop sizes letting you play on your table with a tiny hoop or do it outside with a huge one. So enjoy your time with this awesome Augmented Reality experience!

You will have 3 playing modes in the game: A Free Style mode that you can enjoy your play without any limit; a Challenge Mode that you can try out to unlock new levels; and a completely redesigned Multiplayer experience that you can share this excitement with other players around you. And the game setup is very easy. Just follow the instructions to place your hoop somewhere in your real world and start shooting with your favorite ball.

Basket Busters presents you one of the best Multiplayer and Singleplayer AR gaming experiences in the world. You will feel the excitement and have so much fun while playing with your friends, family, and colleagues. Download now Basket Busters and start exploring the world of Augmented Reality. Let’s shoot some hoops!
